DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore experience needs patient high-grade glioma caregiver . Semi-structured interview patient caregiver conduct analysed use Grounded-Theory approach .
DOC.brief_title: Experiences Needs Patients With High-grade Glioma Their Caregivers
DOC.criteria: Adults Patients primary highgrade glioma treat chemo treat chemo Caregivers patient primary highgrade glioma treat chemo treat chemo Able interview Dutch Patients cerebral metastasis Patients caregiver withdraw inform consent Emotionally cognitive able interviewed
